item.title: Global Message Method [project insanity]
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“Special Air Service, post:1, topic:543924”]This is very easy to do, I know, don’t go flaming me. Basically this is a lot better way for people that want to globally announce something for example using a yell command you can easily add this method. Anyway go to client and search for ‘sendmessage’ under that method add this:

public void globalMessage(String message){ for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { if (p == null) continue; Client c = (Client) p; c.sendMessage(message); } }

Now to use this method it goes like this. If you are using within client class you would simply a use:

c.globalMessage("Your message goes here");

Simples[/quote]
Has been released tons of times… thanks for the contribution, i guess…
